songs.title: 1000 Nights

description.plain: The ‘1000 Nights’ video was shot at Diablo Lake in Washington State. The band state, “We made this one out at Table Rock in Laguna Beach with our guitarist Danny Schnair and videographer Tony Corella. We had to scale a bunch of rocks with our equipment, which was interesting, but getting to that cove to film was worth it. The whole trek sort of nicely tied into the meaning behind ‘1000 Nights,’ in realizing the value of a journey comes from spending it in good company.”

songs.embed_content: Read “1000 Nights” by FRENSHIP on Genius

body.plain: The ‘1000 Nights’ video was shot at Diablo Lake in Washington State. The band state, “We made this one out at Table Rock in Laguna Beach with our guitarist Danny Schnair and videographer Tony Corella. We had to scale a bunch of rocks with our equipment, which was interesting, but getting to that cove to film was worth it. The whole trek sort of nicely tied into the meaning behind ‘1000 Nights,’ in realizing the value of a journey comes from spending it in good company.”

songs.title: Carpet

description.plain:
Alongside its Billboard premiere, FRENSHIP member James Sunderland shared the story behind “Carpet”:

‘Carpet’ was written during a stressful time in my life where I was feeling like I couldn’t get my feet under me. It’s about a conversation I had with an ex while we were lying on the carpet floor of my room and she was telling me I had to ‘do more’ with my life. It’s a conversation that still rings in my head to this day.

songs.embed_content: Read “Carpet” by FRENSHIP on Genius

body.plain:
Alongside its Billboard premiere, FRENSHIP member James Sunderland shared the story behind “Carpet”:

‘Carpet’ was written during a stressful time in my life where I was feeling like I couldn’t get my feet under me. It’s about a conversation I had with an ex while we were lying on the carpet floor of my room and she was telling me I had to ‘do more’ with my life. It’s a conversation that still rings in my head to this day.

songs.lyrics:
6 ContributorsCarpet Lyrics[Verse 1]
I'm living with "I told you so"
And these feelings get a little bit old
On the cusp of getting it right
But it never is black and white, and white, no

[Pre-Chorus]
She gave me the time when shit got rough
A little more time could've been enough for us

[Chorus]
"Do more"
She says to me on the carpet floor
Stretch yourself thin
So I can be with you once again
Before I have to run
And leave these bars of one
[Verse 2]
I'm reaching for what I can't see
But the quiet still gets to me
I swallow, had I known it's worth
Love seldom and that's why it hurts

[Pre-Chorus]
She gave me the time when shit got rough
A little more time could've been enough for us

[Chorus]
"Do more"
She says to me on the carpet floor
Stretch yourself thin

Before I have to run
And leave these bars of one

[Bridge]
She gave me the time when shit got rough
A little more time could've been enough
I ran out of time and lost my luck
A little more time could've been enough for us

[Chorus]
"Do more"
She says to me on the carpet floor
Stretch yourself thin
So I can be with you once again
Before I have to run
And leave these bars of one
Before I have to run
And leave these bars of one
You might also like[Outro]
I said it's not even
You ended up just leaving
Me and your feelings
Lying on the carpet floor
It's not that even
You ended up just leaving
Me and your feelings
Lying on the carpet floor3Embed

songs.lyrics:
5 ContributorsLOVE Somebody Lyrics(Intro)
